title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Beat eggs with cheese and pepper.
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta, then stir in egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Saute onions, then add tomato puree and cook until thick.
Add grilled chicken and cream, then simmer for 10 minutes.
